sentences.english: Switch to whole-wheat couscous and pasta
sentences.chinese: 转变去食用全麦制作的粗麦粉和通心粉。

sentences.english: Spackled some butter over my whole-grain bread.
sentences.chinese: 在我的全麦面包上抹了些许黄油。

sentences.english: And if you're really brave, try making whole-wheat pancakes.
sentences.chinese: 而且如果你够勇敢的话，试试做全麦薄煎饼。

sentences.english: Or use whole-wheat flour and sprinkle wheat germ on your food.
sentences.chinese: 或者食用全麦食物和附和吃些小麦胚芽。

sentences.english: Crackers labeled multigrain may not have whole grains at all.
sentences.chinese: 标有杂粮标志的饼干可能根本不含有全麦。

sentences.english: Keep whole-grain flours in the refrigerator or freezer to extend their life.
sentences.chinese: 全麦面粉要冷躲或冷冻以延长使用寿命。

sentences.english: An egg-white spinach omelet with sliced avocado and some whole-grain toast will do the trick!
sentences.chinese: 蛋白菠菜蛋卷外加鳄梨片儿和全麦土司最好了。

sentences.english: A couple of pieces of whole-grain toast with peanut butter will fit the bill.
sentences.chinese: 两片夹着花生牛油的全麦吐司就符合这一条了。
就完成了一份美味的全麦吐司面包。

sentences.english: Use 100% whole-wheat bread for toast and sandwiches
sentences.chinese: 用全麦面包做吐司或者三文治。

sentences.english: Wholemeal bread is more nutritious than white bread.
sentences.chinese: 全麦面包比白面包要更有营养。

sentences.english: Fibre-packed wholemeal bread could also be laden with sugar.
sentences.chinese: 富含纤维的全麦面包可能也富含糖。

sentences.english: It buckled like a graham cracker.
sentences.chinese: 这就像一个全麦饼干沉着应战。

sentences.english: Try a graham cracker or bowl of cereal.
sentences.chinese: 试试看全麦饼干或者一碗麦片。

sentences.english: I insist on having wholewheat bread.
sentences.chinese: 我坚决主张吃全麦面包。

sentences.english: Whole grains like oatmeal and whole wheat bread are a must as well.
sentences.chinese: 全谷类产品类似燕麦粥和全麦面包也是必须的选择。

definition: grain crops other than rice and wheat
